com.fuzzylimes.jsr.clients

Class LeaderboardsClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.fuzzylimes.jsr.clients.LeaderboardsClient

  • public class LeaderboardsClient
extends Object

    This client is used to make requests to the /leaderboards set of resources on SpeedRun.com's API. The official documentation for this set of APIs can be found in the API Docs.

    Leaderboards contain non-obsolete runs, sorted by time descending. In contrast to raw runs, leaderboards are automatically grouped according to the game/category/level rules that the moderators have defined.

    The client uses static methods for all of the resource calls, so there is now need to initialize anything to make a request. Simply reference the resource you wish to use to retrieve a related pojo.

    • Method Detail

      • getLeaderboardForGameCategory

        public static Leaderboard getLeaderboardForGameCategory(String game,
                                                        String category,
                                                        Boolean embed,
                                                        LeaderboardQuery queryParams)
                                                 throws IOException,
                                                        UnexpectedResponseException
        GET /leaderboards/{game}/category/{category}

        Used to retrieve a leaderboard for a specific Game and Category, filtered by a set of provided LeaderboardQuery query params and optionally enriched with embedded data objects.

        The game and category can be either IDs (e.g. xldev513) or the respective abbreviations (e.g., /leaderboards/smw/category/Any1 will work as expected and redirect to the ID-based URLs).

        • Supports query parameters defined in LeaderboardQuery
        • Supports embedding with
        • https://github.com/speedruncomorg/api/blob/master/version1/leaderboards.md#get-leaderboardsgamecategorycategory
        Parameters:
        game - Either the ID of the game or the abbreviation of the game to be queried
        category - Either the ID of the category or the abbreviation of the category
        embed - whether or not to embed all additional, supported, embed items
        queryParams - LeaderboardQuery query params to be used to filter query
        Returns:
        Leaderboard object for the specified criteria
        Throws:
        IOException - if something goes wrong with mapping
        UnexpectedResponseException - if non-2XX or no body returned to request

      • getLeaderboardForGameLevelCategory

        public static Leaderboard getLeaderboardForGameLevelCategory(String game,
                                                             String level,
                                                             String category,
                                                             Boolean embed,
                                                             LeaderboardQuery queryParams)
                                                      throws IOException,
                                                             UnexpectedResponseException
        GET /leaderboards/{game}/level/{level}/{category}

        Used to retrieve a leaderboard for a specific Category of a Game Level, filtered by a set of provided LeaderboardQuery query params and optionally enriched with embedded data objects.

        The game, level and category can be either IDs (e.g. xldev513) or the respective abbreviations (e.g., /leaderboards/smw/level/Yoshis_Island_1/Any1 will work as expected and redirect to the ID-based URLs).

        • Supports query parameters defined in LeaderboardQuery
        • Supports embedding with
        • https://github.com/speedruncomorg/api/blob/master/version1/leaderboards.md#get-leaderboardsgamelevellevelcategory
        Parameters:
        game - Either the ID of the game or the abbreviation of the game to be queried
        level - Either the ID of the level or the abbreviation of the level
        category - Either the ID of the category or the abbreviation of the category
        embed - whether or not to embed all additional, supported, embed items
        queryParams - LeaderboardQuery query params to be used to filter query
        Returns:
        Leaderboard object for the specified criteria
        Throws:
        IOException - if something goes wrong with mapping
        UnexpectedResponseException - if non-2XX or no body returned to request
